passive_skill.name: Strength to Survive
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 160%); When there is another "Universe Survival Saga" Category ally attacking in the same turn or a "Universe Survival Saga" Category enemy: ATK 60% up when attacking; Launches an additional Super Attack; Every time the character performs 3 or more attacks in battle: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up within the character's next attacking turn (up to 20%)
